title: eli5cience
text: Welcome to eli5science where we break down cutting-edge research into stories anyone can understand!

title: eli5cience
text:
What We Do
We read the papers so you don’t have to. Whether it’s biology, economics, or chemistry, we explain the “why” and “so what” behind such Nobel-worthy discoveries.

title: About Us
text: eli5science is a student-led platform making research accessible to everyone. We believe complex science should be explained simply—without dumbing it down.

title: About Us
text: eli5science is a student-led platform making research accessible to everyone. We believe complex science should be explained simply—without dumbing it down.

title: About Us
text:
The Team
We’re a group of students from India passionate about science communication. This project started as a way to share fascinating research stories with our peers and grew into a platform for collaborative learning.

title: About Us
text:
Contribute
Want to write with us? Check out our GitHub repository to contribute or reach out to us LinkedIn.
